item.title: Publishing Rmarkdown to Wordpress or Jekyll
item.description: Publish to Wordpress When I first starting looking into matters, I was using a Wordpress site hosted on Wordpress.com. I did some research on how to knit and send an .Rmd file to Wordpress with all images going along for the ride. I found Yuhui Xie’s documentation on the official Knitr page which was very helpful and some documentation on uploading images to imgur.com. This approach requires the knitr, markdown and RWordpress packages.
